name: Industrial Sort
description:
Industrial Sort

You have one job, sort the boxes, and casually throw away the explosives.

3 difficulty levels, score tracked independently. Use mouse to drag the boxes.
- Each matched box: +1
- Each explosive still in container: -5

Arciae Discord

We want to know your highscore!
write down in comments! :D

Submission for "20 Second Game Jam" - 2022.
